name: Platform Runner - Baby Alien Run
description:
Baby Alien Run is a platform runner game. Player will constantly move from the left side to the right side of the screen. To move forward in the game, the player must survive a number of hurdles.

Baby alien is a player of the game and he came into a different world. The new world has a view of forest. Player has to survive from spikes, bugs, pits and waterfalls. To survive in this new world Baby Alien must have to collect coins, diamonds, and a key to unlock the final door.

Gameplay:

Game instructions: 'Space' key to Jump
